# OnlinerBase&lt;T&gt;.Subscribe method

Subscribes this tag for cyclical reading and invokes [`ValueChangedEventHandlerDelegate`](../ValueChangedEventHandlerDelegate.md) when the value changes.

```csharp
public void Subscribe(ValueChangedEventHandlerDelegate handler)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| handler | Handles the value change event. |
